pr_title: Fix some problem related with publish version task

timeline.bodyText:
why the replica meta version been updated by ReportHandler before?
this is abnormal, I think using warning is better
timeline.author: yangzhg

replies.author: caiconghui

replies.bodyText: Good explaination. I suggest to add this directly to the comment.
replies.author: morningman

timeline.author: morningman
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1117,5 +1117,13 @@
      */
     @ConfField
     public static String thrift_server_type = ThriftServer.THREAD_POOL;
+
+    /**
+     * This config will decide whether to resend agent task when create_time for agent_task is set,
+     * only when current_time - create_time > agent_task_resend_wait_time_ms can ReportHandler do resend agent task
+     */
+    @ConfField

timeline.message: Add thread name in fe log to make trace problem more easy
Skip to update replica version when new version is lower than replica's version
Add resend time interval check to escape duplicate agent task send
Add doc content for config agent_task_resend_wait_time_ms
small fix in finishTransaction method of DatabaseTransactionMgr
